attributes.title: I downloaded this app because I wanted
attributes.review: I wanted to show support for trump but the app won’t even open💔 and my nana died the day I got it the app just brings bad luck to anyone who gets it, my friend got the app and crashed her car I think it may be Kirsten

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: So I was here to apperciate my president with this app and then I opened it and flying police monkeys came to my house and killed a INNOCENT black man and I sent Donald Duck an email and told me that it was just a few bad flying monkeys so please do not get this app if you dont to see flying police monkeys kill a INNOCENT man #Gen Z #dumptrump #BLACK LIVES MATTER

attributes.title: I’m 26
attributes.review: I have voted every year and I have majored in political science. Trump is a disgrace to the American name, and if he was outside of America, Americans would see him as a national threat. Him and his followers are national terrorists, klan members, and anti humanitarian. Oh, sorry. Anti black, anti just panic, anti asian, anti native, anti Muslim, anti LGBT+, anti women’s reproductive rights, anti love, anti compassion, anti Jesus. Check yourself.

attributes.title: Nearly killed me 💀
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and  for some reason it glitches my phone so bad to the point it actually made my phone spark out with electricity and fell down to flights of stairs. And somebody also slapped my grandma because of this app.

attributes.title: GAVE ME COVID
attributes.review:
This is a tragedy do NOT download this app.
I downloaded this app to support our wonderful president and every time I opened it I fainted on the spot.
I got tested and tested negative for COVID-19 but I kept feeling the same when I opened the app, and then I got tested while the app was open and IM POSTIVE! Don’t get unless you want the corona virus.

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: My pet rat and I were playing with plastic spoons and she told me to download load this app and I said okay. When I download it I was vary disappointed and so was my rat and she loves trump she has a picture of him in her cage but anyway we were both disappointed. DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT 😡

attributes.title: Ew
attributes.review: He looks like a beef jerky stick that has a cold and it made my phone stop working so I had to buy a new one and my phone was a couple months old. Also there is only English on there when a lot of people speak Spanish in America.

attributes.title: worst app ever!!!!!!!
attributes.review: i LOVED mr. trump! i laid by a picture of him every night with my rifles and confederate flag, dreaming to one day touch his toupee on his spray tanned head! but when i opened the app, i was met with a message great called me racial slurs! my phone then jumped out of my hand and karate chopped me so hard i turned into a liberal!!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: No honey 🤡
attributes.review: I was at my house bored so I decided to download this app because why not and then a Cheeto puff came out of nowhere and knocked down my grandma😡. She broke her back and not only that but my mom looked at my screen and fainted to see a terrible sight. Never downloading again 😡.

attributes.title: Never again DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: Never again will I download anything like this. It glitches my phone so much. I tried downloading on my iPad and my ipad shut down and broke 😈😈. This is not fair, I was just trying to support my president 🇺🇸 but now I have a Brocken iPad 🤦🏼‍♀️. Thanks so much Trump🙄
